term.title: Re, Si

item.text: A stereoheterotopic face of a trigonal atom is designated Re if the ligands of the trigonal atom appear in a clockwise sense in order of CIP priority when viewed from that side of the face. The opposite arrangement is termed Si.,See also: enantiotopic, and illustrated under prochirality.
